title: Mid Hair Breakage
description: I was soo excited to try this shampoo, found from it in the list of top best shampoos on Nykaa .. but to my disappointment it failed to treat my hair rightly. I have noticed my hair become too frizzy and mid hair breakage which i was soo shocked to see (I never ever had it) .. whether I normally comb my hair, oil my hair or wash my hair i have noticed extreme hairfall all the time after I started using this product. The Conditioner is okaish better than shampoo atleast.

title: Cooling Sensation
description: The product smells too minty, almost like toothpaste. Overall I feel my dandruff has reduced and the product cools the scalp when you leave it on for a minute. I definitely wouldn't use it in the winter months! Overall, not the best anti dandruff shampoo out there but gets the job done more or less.

When you apply this shampoo, you will roughness in your hair, so obviously u hv to apply the hair mask after applying the shampoo, and believe me, it smoothens my hair! I suggest this shampoo for the people who face dandruff and hairlfall problems together.

Very happy with this product.. Worth evey hype....

title: Amazing combo
description: All 3 products are amazing works on there place. the dove hair therapy breakage repair shampoo helped me get back the strength and volume to my hair.My hairs are so thin and easily brealable After I got the hair therapy breakage repair range, my hair has become strong and volume alao increased. The shampoo is amazing. It makes my hair soft ,shiny and repairs the damage. It is free from harmful chemicals.After the shampoo, I use the dove hair therapy breakage conditioner and leave on solution. It really works wonders on damaged and dull hair. My hair has become more strong and soft. It also protects my hairs from further damages. Now i apply leave on solution The leave on solution is such a lovely product. It really makes my hair soft and shiny. It's natural ingredients protects the hair and gives natural volume, hairfall has also reduced.Great ever

title: Amazing combo
description: All 3 products are amazing works on there place. the dove hair therapy breakage repair shampoo helped me get back the strength and volume to my hair.My hairs are so thin and easily brealable After I got the hair therapy breakage repair range, my hair has become strong and volume alao increased. It really makes my hair soft and shiny. It's natural ingredients protects the hair and gives natural volume, hairfall has also reduced.Great ever

title: Very effective on dry hair and itchi scalp.
description: Main cause of my hairfall was dryness, lack of moisture and itchi scalp. This product has really helped me with that. I have wavy hair but i like to keep them straight, the use of hair dryer makes them more dry. Now i have the solution. From the first wash i have noticed the change it brings to the hair texture. The itchiness has reduced, no dryness, no flaky dandruff. It's a solution to all the problems i was facing with my hair. Now i can blow dry my hair without getting worried about dryness. just loved it.

title: Happy hair days.
description: Due to the pandemic my hair care routine is ruined and above all trying to catch up with life time is of the essence. The Sulphate-free Shampoo, Sulphate-free Conditioner and Moisturizing Leave-on Solution has helped my hair tremendously in a good wayThe product is formulated with vitamin B which is clinically proven to relieve scalp dryness. The sulphate-free collection when used as the 3 step system of shampoo, condition and leave on moisturiser has helped care for my at the hair's cellular level.I have frizzy, dry, and brittle and I always have a very bad hair day, however using this product which has niacinamide has also helped improve and treat my dry scalp, also without sulphates, parabens and dyes which is specially formulated to care for hair is like a good hair day for me. It feels so soft, smooth, and fresh, just out of a salon like feeling most of all HEALTHY.The highlight of this product is that it is cruelty-free hair care.

title: Brilliant for itchy-oily scalp and dry hair
description: I have a itchy-oilyscalp-dry hair situation. It gets worse in summers and monsoon. I found such relief due to this shampoo-conditioner duo. My hair became soft and lustrous and the itchy scalp calmed down. I had some acne around my scalp which also healed. I used an imported Australian shampoo for the past 3 years which discontinued in India. This new range of Dove is the only alternative which worked for my hair and scalp. I highly recommend it.

description: I would just suggest you to go for this. The best shampoo conditioner duo ever and it's worth every single penny! This is the best shampoo ever and it has changed my hair game in one use

I used an imported Australian shampoo for the past 3 years which discontinued in India. This new range of Dove is the only alternative which worked for my hair and scalp. I highly recommend it.

title: Takes time. Worth the wait.
description: So I shampoo everyday because of sweating in the gym. I was frustrated the first week of using this shampoo cuz I thought it made my hair brittle. But like any ayurvedic recipe, from week 2, I started seeing improvement in the hair texture and quality. I shampoo with this and condition with water cress conditioner. I let my hair air dry naturally, and don’t need any serums or silicones to add softness….. I’m loving this simple change so far….

title: Didn’t work
description: The shampoo just did not work for me. It just made my hair so dry that I don’t feel like touching them. I gave it almost 5 times a try for my hair to adapt but no it’s a big fail. It has some cooling sensation for those who like it provides a cool scalp but in person it did not work out for me. Also almost took 3 washes to remove my oil and still the smell of oil stayed now I can’t be washing my hair 5 times. Certain products are not worth the hypes as they are shown sadly i waste my bucks for something which eroded the moisture outta my hair.

description: I have tried so many shampoos after my hair straightening and many times i had a problem of hair fall  so i was scared of using this if my hair again fall but trust me guy's my hair didn't fall and yeah my hair are more manageable and smooth shiny and small makes me crazy like a candy 🍬

title: Best
description: It is a very nice combo. It has all the 3 steps for the best hair shower routine. All the components were well packed in a loreal paris box, which was in turn packed inside a carton. The shampoo nozzle has a thread type closing so you can carry the bottle without leakage problems. The conditioner bottle and serum bottle also doesnt leak. Shampoo and conditioner has a nice scent whereas the serum doesn't.Every hair type is different. To my hair it works amazing. Everything is worth giving a shot. Overall value for money product.❤️

The shampoo nozzle has a thread type closing so you can carry the bottle without leakage problems. The conditioner bottle and serum bottle also doesnt leak. Shampoo and conditioner has a nice scent whereas the serum doesn't.Every hair type is different. To my hair it works amazing. Everything is worth giving a shot. Overall value for money product.❤️

title: Amazing
description: Almost all loreal products are good. I have used it earlier, it's good. It is white smooth shampoo ..neither too thick or thin, just right consistency. Leaves hair smooth for 2-3 days after washing. Hair feel smoother shinier and bouncy. I have naturally straight hair so don't even require conditioner after this. My only concern with this bottle is its different from picture shown which raises doubt that it could be duplicate so I checked on other sites and found that this similar bottle so probably it's a newer lot.Hope this review is helpful.

description: I have a rough and dry curly come wavy hair type but this shampoo is just awsome. The highlight is it gives smoothness and cleanses well it first wash itsself. It is worthy. Absolutely, i will continue my usage with this. 🤗

description: Be careful if have dry hair and for oily hair use it only for cleansing your scalp. It makes your hair dry. If u suffer from flakes and dandruff then use it one's a week just on your scalp and then use other mild shampoo to clean your hair !

title: Definitely reduces dandruff
description: This is the only shampoo that worked for me in terms of reducing dandruff. It does make my hair a little frizzy and dry so if you don't want to compromise on that front, you may try something else. But if dandruff is a major issue for you, just go for this. It works magically. I use serum and conditioner which helps with the frizziness so I don't mind it much.

title: Fall Resist Anti-Dandruff Shampoo
description: Be careful if have dry hair and for oily hair use it only for cleansing your scalp. It makes your hair dry. If u suffer from flakes and dandruff then use it one's a week just on your scalp and then use other mild shampoo to clean your hair !

title: Much better than head and shoulders
description: If you have been using head and shoulders switch to this immediately. dandruff gone in one wash, anti hairfall as well, does what it says but makes hair a little friction when wet. Basically resets the hair style & thickness wise, so conditioner needed. when paired with loreals own conditioners hair does become soft but doesnt offer any hair thickening benefits like repair conditioners. so i combine it with Dove intense repair, so in total hair becomes dandruff free, soft and thick.

title: Must buy for frizz and unruly hair
description: Although it's says it's for thin hair.. I have thick uneven frizzy wavy hair..this is one of the best shampoo I used .. instead of wasting money on big brands this one works like wonders. my hair never felt this soft before... If you oil your hair with almond oil and then use this shampoo it gives you even more soft n bouncy look.. my hair feels softer n frizz.. not sure if it adds volume and it's a gel based shampoo.. I never knew dove has gel based shampoo

description: As u all know that L'oreal brand never disappoint us...  So I'm giving review after finish whole bottle. This is a very purified Shampoo with clay which hydrates your hair , remove excess oil & dirt from your scalp and smells up to last 3 or 4 days which is heaven. And the best thing is after applied this gives u amazing cooling sensation which is best for this monsoon and boom for summer... Thanks Nykaa for give me such a good discount...🤗

title: Never again
description: When I first started using this shampoo and masque combo, I was amazed by the results. My hair started looking and feeling absolutely luxurious and still does whenever I use these. However, the hair fall has been out of control. I can't be sure if it was triggered by the shampoo or the masque but it started on Day 1 and I'm not willing to gamble anymore putting my hair health at risk. I'm sorry I ever made the switch from what used to be my perfect match in terms of hair products. Now I have to deal with a lengthy recovery process. At least I know what I'm going back to. So, unfortunately, this is a big NO from me.

title: Never again
description: When I first started using this shampoo and masque combo, I was amazed by the results. My hair started looking and feeling absolutely luxurious and still does whenever I use these. However, the hair fall has been out of control. I can't be sure if it was triggered by the shampoo or the masque but it started on Day 1 and I'm not willing to gamble anymore putting my hair health at risk. I'm sorry I ever made the switch from what used to be my perfect match in terms of hair products. Now I have to deal with a lengthy recovery process. At least I know what I'm going back to. So, unfortunately, this is a big NO from me.

title: Awesome Products
description: The products are really superb! As i was trying many other products to get rid of hairdall and damaged hair. Before pandamic i was not suffering from hairfall. Once it started during the pandemic i was helpless and finally i got the information about these products and i decided to buy it. I thought i won't get my fluffy and healthy hair back again but trust me this products done there job perfectly. I'm so glad that wothin a week my hair fall has almost stopped. And it has become a very soft and shiny.

I can't be sure if it was triggered by the shampoo or the masque but it started on Day 1 and I'm not willing to gamble anymore putting my hair health at risk. I'm sorry I ever made the switch from what used to be my perfect match in terms of hair products. Now I have to deal with a lengthy recovery process. At least I know what I'm going back to. So, unfortunately, this is a big NO from me.
